It's not possible to set data.html in the request. This field is returned in the response as read-only.
The embed item is rendered on the board inside an iframe.
Below you can find examples of payload body
In the request
URL: replace the <BOARD-ID> and <ACCESS-TOKEN> placeholders with actual
column3: valid values for board ID and app access token.

Name: The app the access token refers to must be running when you send the request.
If the embed has fixed aspect ratio
column4: but not both at the same time.

Name: The missing dimension in the request is calculated automatically to keep the aspect ratio of the embed.
The payload example below includes all the fields you can pass
In the payload body
URL: data.url is the only required field.

Name: In the response
URL: data.mode and data.url are set as per corresponding REST API request.

Name: All other data.* fields in the response data object are fetched from the resource provider (in this case: YouTube)

"description": "Faster Hands & Feet (in 10 days) ► https://www.Drumeo.com/faster/ The Ultimate Drumming Toolbox ►https://www.drumeo.com/ultimate-toolbox/ What's better than one awesome drummer? Two awesome drummers! Check out this drum duet featuring Senri Kawaguchi and Sarah Thawer playing the funky track "Real Life" (by Senri Kawaguchi). They trade solos mid-video before transitioning into a heavier version of the song."
